skills.name: Ocean of Yin
skills.description: [SP: 25][CD: 24s] The wielder gains Ignore Interrupt and 10% ATK Speed for 10s, during which she restores 20.0 HP and 3 SP per 0.5s. Azure Empyrea equip bonus: The Spirit Shield from her Evasion Skill is reset immediately.

skills.name: Ocean of Yang
skills.description: Fu Hua equip bonus: Hitting an enemy with the final hit of any set of her combos boosts her Fire DMG by 18.0% for 18.0s (stacks up tp 3 times) and adds 1 charge (Max: 3). This effect can be triggered once every 2s; triggering it again resets the duration. Using the weapon active grants 3 stacks. When the wielder leaves the battlefield, each charge boosts teammates' Total DMG by 5.0% for 18.0s (triggering this effect again resets the duration), then all charges will be removed.

skills.name: All-Embracing Ki
skills.description: Whenever a team member casts Ultimate, the wielder restores 300.0 HP and 10.0 SP. Team-shared CD: 15s.
